subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: David Nalbandian earned his eighth career title, rallying to defeat José Acasuso, 3-6, 7-6 (5), 6-4, at the Copa Telmex final in Buenos Aires. Acasuso took advantage of Nalbandian’s errors on long rallies in the first set, but Nalbandian’s serve improved in the second.
